This is the first time Eshotroid is running.

This wizard will help you get started with Eshotroid.

You only need to complete this setup on the first run of the application

Internet connection is needed during the setup.
What would you like to do?
Please wait while downloading the list of busses\u2026
Let me pick my favorite busses, download times for them.
Bus times get downloaded when they are opened for the first time. This is not recommended if you don\'t have internet connection all the time.
Please wait while downloading the times for busses you selected\u2026
You have not picked any favorite busses. If you continue, application will start without downloading any bus times.\n\nDo you really want to continue?
In order to use the application efficiently, it is recommended that you complete the setup\n\nDo you really want to cancel?
To change pages, swipe the page to left/right.
To show the times of a bus, click on that bus in the list.
Time of the bus coming next is marked as green. If there is a wheel chair icon next to a bus time, it means that the bus coming that time is wheel chair friendly.
To see the remaining time to a bus, click on the bus time.
To search a bus, click search button and then enter your query.
To add a bus to or remove a bus from the favorite busses list, click the star button next to the bus.
To download again and update the content you are currently viewing, click refresh button.
To show the application menu, swipe to right from the left-most side of the screen or click the icon to the left of the title.

All the information about busses are downloaded from http://mobil.eshot.gov.tr and all the information about Kent Kart are downloaded from http://m.kentkart.com. The developer does not guarantee that the information is correct and has no responsibility over the usage of the application.

If you are interested in the source codes of the application, you can send an e-mail about this to the developer.

Please let the developer know about your opinions, suggestions and errors.
